item.title: Accelerate: The best book I read in 2020
item.description: The book I wish to introduce to you today is titled Accelerate â©, from authors Nicole Forsgren, Jez Humble & Gene Kim . This post isn’t a review â€” it is a short summary of my opinions and insights gained upon reading this book. I’d highly recommend it for anyone who is writing any kind of software(I absolutely mean it ğŸ˜„). How often do we get started with writing code caring very little about deployment in the beginning â€” to realise that we should have thought about it from the start(even if that’s for rapid prototyping).
